item.title: Household rubbish dumped, 8th July

item.title: Bind emptied but huge pile of rubbish temaind, 8th July
item.description:
Bins emptied, but here is still a sprawling pile of rubbish. No space on pavement & windy weather means rubbish is also now all over Long street & Waterson street. Road-sweeper is not effective due to car parking. Consistent problem & it’s horrible :-(

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Waterson Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Corner Brondesbury rd and hazelmere riad, 8th July
item.description:
Build up of leaves on the pavement. Needs sweeping

item.title: Weeds growing along council blocked paving footpath in Ivychurch Close.., 8th July
item.description:
Weeds are coming up all along the council blocked paving footpaths in Ivychurch Close. Please can you treat them and remove them. Looks neglected and an eyesore. Thankyou
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ivychurch Close, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken chair in planter outside 4 Middleton Road, 8th July
item.description:
Someone has put a broken chair and garden waste in one of the planter boxes outside 4 Middleton Road. I submitted another report last week and got an email to say it had been resolved but the chair is still there as of 8th July.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Middleton Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Three abandoned temporary traffic signs between Eurochange and Sainsbury's Local on the west side of Charing Cross Road., 8th July
item.description:
Temporary street signs and cones and barriers are not being collected after works, diversions, or events have completed. Conway should be asked to do ad hoc surveys and pick up items.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Charing Cross Road, Bloomsbury, City of Westminster
